committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to designate the 9th day of October of each year as Lief Erikson Day and to authorize the President to call for the appropriate celebration of such day.

summary.text: Designates the ninth day of October of each year as "Leif Ericson Day."

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate the 9th day of October of each year as Lief Erikson Day and to authorize the President to call for the appropriate celebration of such day.
